desc: Michelle Hope is a dermatology tested luxury skin care range for women of all colour, skin types and tones. Outlets include in-room spa amenities and boutique hotel spas.

layout.text: Our founder Michelle Hope, brings over 7 years of beauty experience to market. She believes that beauty and skin care is for everyone.
She’s created a range of products for every skin type.
The Luxury Signature collection for women of colour.
The Essential range for the whole family, men & women.
